content.rendered:
Directed by Chris McKay.

Written by Ryan Ridley. Robert Kirkman. Ava Tramer.

Cast Nicholas Hoult .Nicolas Cage .Awkwafina

Languages English. French.

Producer David Alpert. Bryan Furst. Sean Furst. Gary Huckabay. Robert Kirkman. Todd Lewis. Jack LoGiudice. Chris McKay. Samantha Nisenboim.

Production Universal Pictures. Skybound Entertainment.
